tool.name: OGS: TecPlotTools
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'TecPlotTools'.
tool.command: if [ "$input_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input_file' '${$input_file.element_identifier}'; fi; TecPlotTools $split $convert --input-file '$input_file.element_identifier' --output-file output_1.vtu

param.name: split
param.label: split
param.help: split time steps into separate files

param.name: convert
param.label: convert
param.help: convert TecPlot data into OGS meshes

tool.help: This tool runs the **TecPlotTools** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
